title: Modelones Announces New Collaboration with Renowned Nail Artist Sarah Haidar as Brand Ambassador
description: Modelones, a world-leading nail art brand, has officially partnered with Sarah Haidar (@heluviee), the influential nail artist and social media sensation, as its newest brand ambassador. With her impeccable style and a massive social media following of over 1.8 million, Sarah brings her expertise ...Continue reading
author: Modelones
excerpt: As a Modelones Brand Ambassador and Global Pro Nail Artist, Sarah Haidar will not only be a brand ambassador, but also contribute professional advice on nail styles and color choices.
text: Modelones, a world-leading nail art brand, has officially partnered with Sarah Haidar (@heluviee), the influential nail artist and social media sensation, as its newest brand ambassador. With her impeccable style and a massive social media following of over 1.8 million, Sarah brings her expertise and creativity to the Modelones brand, helping to further elevate its standing in the beauty and fashion industry. In addition to being a brand ambassador, Sarah Haidar is also serving as Modelones' Global Pro Nail Artist, offering her professional insights on nail designs, colors, and trends to help elevate the brand's offerings and keep them at the forefront of industry trends.Photo: Courtesy of Modelones Introducing Sarah Haidar: The Perfect Fit for ModelonesSarah Haidar is widely recognized for her captivating nail art creations and has become an influential figure in the beauty world. As a Modelones Brand Ambassador and Global Pro Nail Artist, Sarah will not only be showcasing the brand's innovative nail polish collections but also contributing professional advice on nail styles and color choices, ensuring that Modelones stays ahead of the curve in terms of design and quality. Known for her viral trends, Sarah's "Pinterest Hand" has been featured in major media outlets, further solidifying her status as a trailblazer in the nail art community. Her influence has sparked millions of views and new trends, and now, her collaboration with Modelones marks an exciting new chapter in her career. Additionally, Sarah participated in Modelones' "10-Year On The Go" pop-up event on May 25 in Los Angeles, celebrating the Modelones 10th anniversary. At the event, Sarah shared her views on the art of nail design, interacted with fans and provided an exclusive look at her creative process.Photo: Courtesy of Modelones Sarah Haidar on Why She Chose to Collaborate with ModelonesIn a statement, Sarah shared her excitement about joining the Modelones team. "I've always admired how Modelones consistently releases new collections every season, staying ahead of the latest trends," Sarah explained. "I never have to worry about not finding the perfect shades for my designs. Also, this year is Modelones' 10th anniversary, which speaks volumes about their commitment to quality and staying relevant in the industry. I'm excited to be a part of this milestone."The Modelones 28-Color Gel Nail Polish Set: A Perfect Palette for Every Occasion Sarah's first collaboration with Modelones includes their 32 PCS Gel Nail Polish Set, which features an extensive collection of 28 stunning shades. The kit includes 7ml bottles of vibrant, long-lasting colors, as well as four essential top coats – No Wipe Base, Glitter, Glossy, and Matte. Ideal for both daily wear and special occasions, the set offers a diverse range of hues to create timeless and elegant nail designs that last.Scroll to ContinueRecommended ArticlesPhoto: Courtesy of ModelonesAmong the most standout shades, Sarah has drawn inspiration from colors like Shade 2373 (sheer base), 2337 (pearly swirls), and 1634 + 2620 (flower overtop). Her signature design style is evident in her use of pearlescent swirls and floral patterns, perfectly encapsulating the fresh, fun and elegant aesthetic of the Modelones brand.Photo: Courtesy of Modelones Sarah's Favorite Modelones Gel Polish: A Beachy, Sparkling BlueWhen asked about her personal favorite from the Modelones gel polish collection, Sarah didn't hesitate. "My favorite polish from Modelones has to be Shade 2614 from the 28 colors gel nail polish set. It's this beautiful beachy, mermaid blue with just the right amount of sparkle," she said. "I'm actually wearing it right now! It's one of those shades that catches the light and makes you want to stare at your nails all day. I absolutely love it!"Photo: Courtesy of Modelones A Strong Partnership in the Beauty Industry.As the collaboration with Sarah Haidar continues to evolve, it's clear that Modelones is dedicated to not only providing exceptional nail care but also embracing the creativity and trends that shape the future of the beauty industry. For more information, check out Modelones' 28-Color Gel Nail Polish Set and stay tuned for more exciting collaborations and releases from the brand!About Modelones Based in Los Angeles, Modelones is a leading nail art brand known for its top-tier nail products. The brand has built a solid reputation across more than 30 countries, with a community of over 10 million followers. Modelones has been recognized as the Most Valuable Brand of the Year on Amazon and continues to collaborate with major influencers and platforms, including celebrity nail artist Tom Bachik. With recent showcases in iconic locations like the Eiffel Tower, Modelones continues to shape the future of nail art.
html:
Modelones, a world-leading nail art brand, has officially partnered with Sarah Haidar (@heluviee), the influential nail artist and social media sensation, as its newest brand ambassador. With her impeccable style and a massive social media following of over 1.8 million, Sarah brings her expertise and creativity to the Modelones brand, helping to further elevate its standing in the beauty and fashion industry. In addition to being a brand ambassador, Sarah Haidar is also serving as Modelones' Global Pro Nail Artist, offering her professional insights on nail designs, colors, and trends to help elevate the brand's offerings and keep them at the forefront of industry trends.

Introducing Sarah Haidar: The Perfect Fit for Modelones

Sarah Haidar is widely recognized for her captivating nail art creations and has become an influential figure in the beauty world. As a Modelones Brand Ambassador and Global Pro Nail Artist, Sarah will not only be showcasing the brand's innovative nail polish collections but also contributing professional advice on nail styles and color choices, ensuring that Modelones stays ahead of the curve in terms of design and quality. Known for her viral trends, Sarah's "Pinterest Hand" has been featured in major media outlets, further solidifying her status as a trailblazer in the nail art community. Her influence has sparked millions of views and new trends, and now, her collaboration with Modelones marks an exciting new chapter in her career.

Additionally, Sarah participated in Modelones' "10-Year On The Go" pop-up event on May 25 in Los Angeles, celebrating the Modelones 10th anniversary. At the event, Sarah shared her views on the art of nail design, interacted with fans and provided an exclusive look at her creative process.

Sarah Haidar on Why She Chose to Collaborate with Modelones

In a statement, Sarah shared her excitement about joining the Modelones team. "I've always admired how Modelones consistently releases new collections every season, staying ahead of the latest trends," Sarah explained. "I never have to worry about not finding the perfect shades for my designs. Also, this year is Modelones' 10th anniversary, which speaks volumes about their commitment to quality and staying relevant in the industry. I'm excited to be a part of this milestone."

The Modelones 28-Color Gel Nail Polish Set: A Perfect Palette for Every Occasion

Sarah's first collaboration with Modelones includes their 32 PCS Gel Nail Polish Set, which features an extensive collection of 28 stunning shades. The kit includes 7ml bottles of vibrant, long-lasting colors, as well as four essential top coats – No Wipe Base, Glitter, Glossy, and Matte. Ideal for both daily wear and special occasions, the set offers a diverse range of hues to create timeless and elegant nail designs that last.

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

Among the most standout shades, Sarah has drawn inspiration from colors like Shade 2373 (sheer base), 2337 (pearly swirls), and 1634 + 2620 (flower overtop). Her signature design style is evident in her use of pearlescent swirls and floral patterns, perfectly encapsulating the fresh, fun and elegant aesthetic of the Modelones brand.

Sarah's Favorite Modelones Gel Polish: A Beachy, Sparkling Blue

When asked about her personal favorite from the Modelones gel polish collection, Sarah didn't hesitate. "My favorite polish from Modelones has to be Shade 2614 from the 28 colors gel nail polish set. It's this beautiful beachy, mermaid blue with just the right amount of sparkle," she said. "I'm actually wearing it right now! It's one of those shades that catches the light and makes you want to stare at your nails all day. I absolutely love it!"

A Strong Partnership in the Beauty Industry.

As the collaboration with Sarah Haidar continues to evolve, it's clear that Modelones is dedicated to not only providing exceptional nail care but also embracing the creativity and trends that shape the future of the beauty industry.

For more information, check out Modelones' 28-Color Gel Nail Polish Set and stay tuned for more exciting collaborations and releases from the brand!

About Modelones

Based in Los Angeles, Modelones is a leading nail art brand known for its top-tier nail products. The brand has built a solid reputation across more than 30 countries, with a community of over 10 million followers. Modelones has been recognized as the Most Valuable Brand of the Year on Amazon and continues to collaborate with major influencers and platforms, including celebrity nail artist Tom Bachik. With recent showcases in iconic locations like the Eiffel Tower, Modelones continues to shape the future of nail art.
